question: Which of the following provisions of the ‘Communal Award’ is not correct?
option1: Member of the depressed classes were assigned reserved seats and separate electorates
option3: Separate electorates for the Europeans and the Sikhs
option4: The separate electorates were to lapse at the end of 10 years
answer: The separate electorates were to lapse at the end of 10 years
explanation: The British Prime Minister McDonald announced the Communal Award on August 16, 1932. The Communal Award was basically a proposal on minority representation. The separate electorates were to lapse at the end of 10 years wasn't the provision of the Communal Award.
